overview:
@hanskoning Interest: Angel, Australia, disruptive things, economics, entrepreneurship, healthcare, human rights, networking, pop-art, sports, trends, travel, TTIM, wine.

skills: Business developer, change manager, consultant, informal investor, innovator, strategist.

bio: Hans Koning is an entrepreneur, informal investor, interim manager and consultant since 1994. As a consultant he guides companies and implementing growth strategies, innovation projects change management and marketing strategies. As an entrepreneur Hans has set up some companies and invested in a few start-ups and existing companies.
